title: Manage CRM and Sphere of Influence (SOI)
description: An agent wants to systematically market to their past clients and personal contacts (their SOI).

tasks.description: Segment the contacts in the CRM database into categories (e.g., past clients, hot leads, cold leads, personal friends).
tasks.expected_outcome: The CRM is organized for targeted marketing.

tasks.description: Set up all contacts on a monthly email newsletter with market updates and home tips.
tasks.expected_outcome: A monthly newsletter campaign is launched.

tasks.description: Create a task to call everyone in the 'past client' category quarterly to check in and ask for referrals.
tasks.expected_outcome: A systematic calling plan is implemented in the CRM.
